participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, I thrive in social situations and love to explore new activities.
participant_1.background: I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time. I enjoy golfing. I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute. I am from Austin, Texas. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Driven and focused, I am passionate about learning and always looking for ways to improve myself.
participant_2.background: I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies. My favorite food is strawberries. I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars. I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes. I am trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing.

content.text: Hey! I'm from Austin, Texas too! What part of town are you from?
I'm from South Austin! What about you?
I'm from north Austin near the lake!
Oh cool! I've been to the lake a few times. It's so pretty there.
It is! I love going there to relax and swim.
Me too! I also love to go hiking and biking around the lake.
I've never been hiking or biking around the lake, but I've heard it's really beautiful.
It is! You should definitely check it out sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go to concerts and dance my heart out. I also enjoy golfing and spending time outdoors.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go to concerts too. I've never been golfing, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to get exercise.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
